sentence.Network_en: All the family attended the baptism of the first grandchild.
sentence.Network_cn: 家庭所有成员都参加了第一个孙子的洗礼仪式.

sentence.Network_en: We're taking our little grandchild away with us. We'll make sure he has the time of his life.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们会把小孙子带走。我们一定会让他过得开心。

sentence.Network_en: Have you no consideration for my grandchild's future?
sentence.Network_cn: 你就不为我孙女的终身大事想想 吗 ?

entry.def: Someone's grandchild is the child of their son or daughter.

example.tran: 玛丽很疼爱她的孙子们。

means.word_mean: 1. a child of your son or daughter

Sentence.sentence: We write to preserve our family histories so our children and grandchildren can learn and appreciate their heritage (传统).
